00025 /* File Viewer */
00026 
00027 require '../sysconfig.inc.php';
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00030 
00031 // privileges checking
00032 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('bibliography', 'r');
00033 if (!$can_read) {
00034     die('<div class="errorBox">You dont have enough privileges to view this section</div>');
00035 }
00036 
00037 // get file ID
00038 $fileID = isset($_GET['fid'])?(integer)$_GET['fid']:0;
00039 
00040 // query file to database
00041 $file_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM files WHERE file_id='.$fileID);
00042 $file_d = $file_q->fetch_assoc();
00043 
00044 if ($file_q->num_rows > 0) {
00045     $file_loc = REPO_BASE_DIR.str_ireplace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $file_d['file_dir']).DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.$file_d['file_name'];
00046     if (file_exists($file_loc)) {
00047         header('Content-Disposition: inline; filename="'.basename($file_loc).'"');
00048         header('Content-Type: '.$file_d['mime_type']);
00049         readfile($file_loc);
00050         exit();
00051     } else {
00052         if ($file_d['mime_type'] == 'text/uri-list') {
00053             header('Location: '.$file_d['file_url']);
00054             exit();
00055         }
00056         die('<div class="errorBox">File Metadata exists in database BUT '.$file_loc.' does\'t exists in repository!</div>');
00057     }
00058 } else {
00059     die('<div class="errorBox">File Not Found!</div>');
00060 }
00061 ?>
